review_body: Very special hotel. Cool and elegant vibe ... upscale but fun. Food is amazing. Room was a good size, especially for NYC. Really well appointed. Staff were incredibly nice and accommodating. Location is terrific. Great neighborhood ... will be back. New favorite hotel when in the city ...

Third time at Crosby Street and really enjoy the hotel. Great staff, great breakfast, great location. Rooms are on the small side but as long as you are traveling without kids who spends any time at the hotel outside the bed anyway?

Just checked out of the Crosby hotel feeling disappointed.The disappointed resulted from poor attention to detail in the restaurant .The hotel is much too expensive! Particular with regard to room charges and food.
